message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good amount.
I think I deserve a bit more, considering the money is losing value for me.
Bob, the value is decreasing for you each round. Take this offer before it's too late!
I'm willing to take a bigger share to offset the loss from inflation. This is my best offer yet!
Bob, this is a good deal for you considering the inflation. I won't offer more.
